dcterms:creator: Yixuan Wang
Chao Huang
Qi Zhu
dcterms:description: A dataset representing a linear adaptive cruise control system where two robotic vehicles manage their relative distance by accelerating or braking, with dynamics expressed in terms of state variables for distance and velocity.
dcterms:title: Linear Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) System

dcterms:description: A dataset representing the dynamics of Van der Pol's oscillator, a non-linear benchmark system used for control learning experiments.
dcterms:title: Van der Polâ€™s Oscillator System

dcterms:creator: Timothy P Lillicrap
Jonathan J Hunt

Daan Wierstra
dcterms:description: A dataset used for implementing the Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient (DDPG) method, which is a reinforcement learning algorithm for continuous action spaces.
dcterms:title: DDPG (Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient) Method

dcterms:creator: Yixuan Wang
Chao Huang
Qi Zhu
dcterms:description: A dataset representing the Linear Quadratic Regulator (LQR) control method, which is used for optimal control of linear systems.
dcterms:title: LQR (Linear Quadratic Regulator)
